The gravitational lensing paper about rendering a black hole that Kip Thorne and co mentioned was in the pipe has been published. It's pretty involved (and interesting), and includes some renders on how the simulations turned out before the renderings were modified to make them more comprehensible to Interstellar's viewers.

Article in New Scientist has a good summary, and the paper is here, it has a few more images in it.
